__e: A woman who possesses a spirit power that can turn a serpent into the mightiest dragon of all.
As the spiritual leader of her people, the living Force inside the Queen must be very powerful.
We need a new spiritual way of understanding the nature of what it is to be a human being.
- My dad made us laugh all the time, he's witty and silly.
They took the real world and the spiritual world... and he... added together.
I mean, he's not always funny... but he really is very clever... and nobody makes me laugh like he does.
And that's as spiritual as it gets.

You are never going to find the kind of relationship that I know you want... and you are never going to be the kind of spiritual leader that you could be... until you learn to put a little faith in other people.
I'll tell you what I hope. I hope that I never lose faith in one of the kindest, most spiritual human beings I have ever met.
